name: Presh Marketing Solutions
tagline: Digital Marketing For The IT Channel
description: Presh Marketing Solutions is a digital and inbound marketing agency based out of Tampa, FL. We help technology value-added-resellers (VARs) and managed-service-providers (MSPs) attract new prospects and generate inbound sales leads through digital and inbound marketing. We help IT manufacturers manage their channel marketing through channel marketing software and co-marketing engagements.
